member.name: T:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas
member.summary: An implementation of that draws onto a control. The class manages an internal and object used for rendering shapes, text and images.

member.name: F:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.bitmap
member.summary: Backing bitmap used as the drawing surface.

member.name: F:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.graphics
member.summary: Graphics object obtained from used to perform drawing operations.

member.name: P:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.Xpos
member.summary: Current X position for drawing operations.

member.name: P:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.Ypos
member.summary: Current Y position for drawing operations.

member.name: P:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.PenColour
member.summary: Current pen/brush colour used for drawing. Stored as to match the interpreter's canvas interface but is expected to hold a instance. Defaults to .

member.name: F:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.output
member.summary: The control that displays the canvas bitmap to the user.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided as the display target. If the control already has a positive size, the internal bitmap/graphics objects are created immediately.
member.param: The picture box that will display the canvas.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.Set(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates or replaces the internal bitmap and graphics objects with the specified size and clears the surface to white.
member.param: Width of the drawing surface in pixels.
Height of the drawing surface in pixels.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the current pen position to the specified coordinates without drawing.
member.param: New X coordinate.
New Y coordinate.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.DrawTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a line from the current pen position to the specified coordinates and updates the current position to the target point.
member.param: Target X coordinate.
Target Y coordinate.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.Circle(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a circle centered at the current pen position.
member.param: Radius of the circle in pixels.
If true, the circle is filled; otherwise only the outline is drawn.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.Rect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a rectangle with the top-left corner at the current pen position.
member.param: Width of the rectangle in pixels.
Height of the rectangle in pixels.
If true, the rectangle is filled; otherwise only the outline is drawn.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.Tri(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws an isosceles triangle with the base starting at the current pen position. The triangle's base spans pixels and its height is pixels.
member.param: Width of the triangle base in pixels.
Height of the triangle in pixels.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.Clear
member.summary: Clears the drawing surface to white and refreshes the display.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.Reset
member.summary: Resets the drawing state: pen position to (0,0) and colour to black.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.SetColour(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the pen colour using RGB components.
member.param: Red component (0-255).
Green component (0-255).
Blue component (0-255).

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.WriteText(System.String)
member.summary: Writes text at the current pen position using a default font.
member.param: The text to draw.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.getBitmap
member.summary: Returns the underlying bitmap used by the canvas. The return type is to match the usage in the application UI code.
member.returns: The instance used as the drawing surface.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Canvas.PanelCanvas.Refresh
member.summary: Updates the picture box to display the current bitmap and forces a redraw of the control.

member.name: T:BOOSEInterpreter.Core.AppCommandFactory
member.summary: Factory that creates application-specific command implementations for the BOOSE interpreter. Extends the base to return commands that operate on the application's .

member.summary: The canvas instance that created commands will use for rendering.

member.param: The that commands should draw to.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Core.AppCommandFactory.MakeCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance for the given command . Returns application-specific command implementations where available; otherwise falls back to the base factory behavior.
member.param: The command name to create (case-insensitive).
member.returns: An instance for the requested command.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Core.Command.AppCircle.Compile
member.summary: Performs compilation-time checks or transformations for the command. This command imposes no compile-time restrictions.

member.summary: Validates parameter array for this command. This implementation accepts any parameters (validation is performed in by parsing the string).

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Core.Command.AppCircle.Execute

member.name: T:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1
member.summary: Main form class for the BOOSE Interpreter application. Handles UI interaction, parsing, execution, and canvas updates.

member.name: F:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.parser
member.summary: Parser instance used for interpreting BOOSE code.

member.name: F:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.program
member.summary: Stores the compiled BOOSE program for execution.

member.name: F:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.canvas
member.summary: Custom canvas used for drawing BOOSE graphics.

member.name: F:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.factory
member.summary: Factory that creates BOOSE commands, including custom commands.

member.name: F:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.lastExecutedCode
member.summary: Stores the previously executed code so it can be saved even after the input box is cleared.

member.name: F:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.fullCode
member.summary: Stores ALL executed commands (history) used when saving code.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Sets up all required BOOSE components and UI bindings.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.Log(System.String)
member.summary: Appends a message to the debug console area.
member.param: Message to output.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.runButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Executes the multiline BOOSE code written in the input box. Clears the text box after successful execution but preserves the code for saving.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.textBox1_TextChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Unused text-changed event for the single-line input box.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.RunSingleLine(System.String)
member.summary: Parses and executes a single BOOSE command entered by the user.
member.param: The command to execute.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.textBox1_KeyDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Detects when the user presses Enter in the single-line input box and immediately executes the command.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.newToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Clears all input, output, canvas, and debug logs. Resets workspace to blank.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.codeToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Loads BOOSE code from a .boose file into the multiline input box.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.imageToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Loads an external image and displays it on the drawing canvas.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.codeToolStripMenuItem1_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Saves the last executed BOOSE code to a .boose file. Works even if the input box is empty.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.imageToolStripMenuItem1_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Saves the current drawing canvas image as a PNG file.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.clearToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Clears the drawing canvas and the debug output.

member.name: M:BOOSEInterpreter.Form1.exitToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Safely closes the application.

member.summary: Shows basic information about the BOOSE Interpreter application.

Event arguments.

Event arguments.
